info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:53PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Elbert, southeastern Hart and southwestern Anderson Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 553 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Hartwell, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hartwell, Reed Creek, Starr, Anderson Airport, Lake Hartwell, Nuberg, and Sadlers Creek State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
